scripts.svgo:all: npm run svgo:images10 && npm run svgo:images11
scripts.webp:photos: bash -lc 'for d in images08 images12; do for f in "$d"/*.{jpg,jpeg,png,JPG,JPEG,PNG}; do [ -f "$f" ] || continue; cwebp -q 82 "$f" -o "${f%.*}.webp"; done; done'
scripts.webp:signals: bash -lc 'for f in images07/*.png; do [ -f "$f" ] || continue; cwebp -lossless -m 6 "$f" -o "${f%.*}.webp"; done'
scripts.webp:all: npm run webp:photos && npm run webp:signals
scripts.webp:thumbs: bash -lc 'for d in images07 images08 images12; do for f in "$d"/*.{jpg,jpeg,JPG,JPEG}; do [ -f "$f" ] || continue; tmp="${f%.*}.tmp.jpg"; sips -Z 640 "$f" --out "$tmp" >/dev/null; cwebp -q 82 "$tmp" -o "${f%.*}.webp"; rm -f "$tmp"; done; done'
